column4: Hey guys I just downloaded something (and IRC client) from synaptic but i have no idea how to launch the program... it didnt show up in any of my top menus and I'm a complete linux newb

It intentionally doesn't show in the menus because it does not have a GUI (i.e. a "window" and nice graphics). To run it, open up a terminal (Applications->Accessories->Terminal, assuming you are on Ubuntu) and type 'ircii'
